short_summary: Stokes Litter Sparing, Civi che, recharge
full_summary:
**Stokes Litter Sparing**

**Reference:** cb-7707-114270, Amendment 6
**Publication Date:** July 28, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 13, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

**Description of Work:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to deliver various rescue equipment and accessories, as outlined in the attached bid solicitation document.

**Lists of Articles:**
* 25 x Strap, tie-down, electrical components (part no. T50R6M4)
* 10 x Sling, patient (part no. 0575250-1)
* 10 x Sling, patient (part no. 0575249-1)
* 30 x Lift insert, patient (part no. 160)
* 6 x Retractable guideline
* 11 x Patient flotation restraint set (part no. DSSPM 409-04)
* 10 x Cormorant lifting harness (part no. 1840061-1)
* 20 x Guideline, CH146/124 (part no. DSSPM422-04)
* 20 x Restraint set, litter patient (part no. 9490090)
* 10 x Restraint set, litter (part no. 140)
* 50 x Basket, Stokes rigid litter (part no. 439)
* 50 x Strap, litter, load adapter (part no. 94900096)
* 100 x Pad, cushioning (part no. 182)
* 25 x Cover, litter carrier (part no. 409)

**Substitution of Equivalent Products:**
Contractors proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name and model number, as well as the NCAGE code.

**Notice:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement and may seek alternates to the selected bidder. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
Name: Dan Lebel
Email: dany.lebel@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Attachments:**
The bid solicitation document, as well as the previous amendment documents, can be found at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
